1.situation: You are working in a team on a project with a tight deadline. options.A: Offer to help your team member by working together on their tasks after you have completed your own work, even if it means staying late (High $Trait).

options.D: Avoid getting involved and focus entirely on completing your own part of the project to the best of your ability (Low $Trait).

options.A: Create a detailed plan and prioritize the tasks, working late if necessary to ensure everything is completed on time (High Conscientiousness).
